00136     class Iterator {
00137         friend class CursusManager;
00138         Cursus** currentCursus; 
00139         unsigned int nbRemain;
00145         Iterator(Cursus** c, unsigned nb):currentCursus(c),nbRemain(nb){}
00146        public:
00150             Iterator():nbRemain(0),currentCursus(0){}
00155             bool isDone() const { return nbRemain==0; }
00159             void next() {
00160                 if (isDone())
00161                         throw UTProfilerException("error, next on an iterator which is done");
00162                 nbRemain--;
00163                 currentCursus++;
00164             }
00169             Cursus& current() const {
00170                 if (isDone())
00171                     throw UTProfilerException("error, indirection on an iterator which is done");
00172                 return **currentCursus;
00173             }
00174     };

00180         return Iterator(mesCursus,nbCursus);
00181    };
